ChildRules.RuleName: If Line Count empty -> set to 1
If Page Count empty -> set to 1 and Q page header

Attributes._Description: "This checks to see if we need to start a new page.  If so, end current page tag, open a new page tag, and reset the line counter."

ChildRules.RuleName: If Line Count empty -> set to 1
If Page Count empty -> set to 1 and Q page header

Attributes._Description: "This checks to see if we need to start a new page.  If so, end current page tag, open a new page tag, and reset the line counter."
"This indicates that this is an EDI claim that is being processed for EDI.  This is done prior to rollups, splitting, etc."
"If so this detail line is associated with the split that we're currently processing."
